text:
@WhiteHouse While giving the press briefing with Coronavirus Task Force President Trump said last week it was 38% positive case in New York. This week there is a drastic fall and it comes to 20% in New York city.
In Luisiana the 20% positive tests have come to 15%. 18 states have declined...
